attributes.action: Let UKIP debate in the General Election's
attributes.additional_details: As Ukip are on the rise for getting votes from people who have never voted before, parties like Labour, Tories are trying to do whatever they can to stop ukip from attending the general elections. I believe each political party should have the same rights and not to be left out. I am asking the conservative party to look into this matter and tell the public what's going to happen.
